meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one billion hertz.
meanings.sent1: My new phone operates at two gigahertzes, making it very fast.
meanings.sent2: The wifi router broadcasts at 2.4 gigahertzes for a stable connection.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally set the microwave to cook at a million gigahertzes, and now it's a time machine!
meanings.sent4: The music festival was so loud that it felt like a million gigahertzes vibrating through my body.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the jet engine was like a thousand gigahertzes roaring in my ears.

meanings.definition: The speed of a computer's central processing unit, measured in gigahertzes.
meanings.sent1: His new laptop has a processor speed of three gigahertzes, making it very efficient.
meanings.sent2: The old computer only runs at 1.5 gigahertzes, so it's quite slow compared to modern ones.
meanings.sent3: I spilled coffee on my computer, and now it runs on negative gigahertzes - it's going backwards!
meanings.sent4: Her brain was working at a million gigahertzes, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room was palpable, like a thousand gigahertzes of energy pulsing through the air.
